sentences.en: ...the sequence of events that left the eight pupils battling to survive in icy seas for over four hours.
sentences.cn: …使4名小学生在冰冷的海洋中挣扎求生超过4个小时的一连串事件。

sentences.en: Companies must be able to survive in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 公司必须有能力在市场竞争中生存下去。

sentences.en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

sentences.en: Drugs that dissolve blood clots can help people survive heart attacks.
sentences.cn: 能溶解血栓的药物会有助于治疗心脏病。

sentences.en: For centuries farmers there have only just managed to survive.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来，那里的农民只能勉强维持生计。

sentences.en: He can scarcely survive this scandal with his reputation intact.
sentences.cn: 他经此丑闻名誉很难不受损.

sentences.en: He had survived heart bypass surgery.
sentences.cn: 他在心脏搭桥手术中活了下来。

sentences.en: It's important that these upland farms continue to survive.
sentences.cn: 这些高原农场能继续存在下去非常重要。

sentences.en: Most women will survive their spouses.
sentences.cn: 大多数女性都比配偶长寿。

sentences.en: No one survived the crash.
sentences.cn: 无人在这次撞击中幸免于难。

sentences.en: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.cn: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.en: people who survive cancer
sentences.cn: 癌症幸存者

sentences.en: She survived the attack.
sentences.cn: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.en: Some infantile actions survive into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 某些婴儿期的行为一直保持到成年期.

sentences.en: The company found it hard to survive in a changing marketplace.
sentences.cn: 这家公司难以在不断变化的市场中生存.

sentences.en: The first thing parents want to know is: will the baby survive?
sentences.cn: 父母亲最想知道的是：孩子能活下来吗？

sentences.en: The time has come for action if these beautiful animals are to survive.
sentences.cn: 若要使这些美丽的动物能生存下去，现在就要行动起来。

sentences.en: These plants cannot survive in very cold conditions.
sentences.cn: 这些植物在严寒中不能存活.

sentences.en: Those organisms that are most suited to the environment will be those that will survive.
sentences.cn: 那些最适应环境的生物将是那些存活下来的。

sentences.en: We taught soldiers to bayonet and to survive hand - to - hand combat.
sentences.cn: 我们教给士兵如何使用刺刀和怎样在短兵相接的战斗中生存下来.

sentences.en: Whatever happens, you must survive all along.
sentences.cn: 不管发生什么事, 你必须好好活着.

sentences.en: When the market economy is introduced, many factories will not survive.
sentences.cn: 引入市场经济后，许多工厂将面临倒闭。

words.tran_cn: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物
活命主义者；成功地活下来的人

trans.tran_cn: 生存，存活，幸存，艰难度过，比…活得久
trans.tran_en: If something survives, it continues to exist even after being in a dangerous situation or existing for a long time
to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

trans.tran_cn: 从…逃出，幸免于；从中挺过来；比…活得长
trans.tran_en: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness
